plot: National Guard soldiers from 46 states must unite to provide air support across Iraq and prevent Al Queda from expanding control.
title: Answering the Call
plot_es: National Guard soldiers from 46 states must unite to provide air support across Iraq and prevent Al Queda from expanding control.
plot_en: National Guard soldiers from 46 states must unite to provide air support across Iraq and prevent Al Queda from expanding control.
